pkgmetadata.longdescription:
GStreamer plugin wrapping the GStreamer/GConf audio/video output settings
Includes the following elements: * gconfaudiosrc - Audio source embedding the GConf-settings for audio input * gconfaudiosink - Audio sink embedding the GConf-settings for audio output * gconfvideosrc - Video source embedding the GConf-settings for video input * gconfvideosink - Video sink embedding the GConf-settings for video output
